name: Timefall (itch) (Miguel Martinho, Condmaker, Bezerra, dtfernandes)
description:
TIMEFALL

Timefall is a 3D first-person dungeon crawler, with a focus on puzzles and dialogue. The game aims to replicate the visual style of old games from the PS1. Adventure through a mysterious dungeon, find out what story it tells, and solve its many enigmas and puzzles.

WASDBasic MovementQ & EStrafe Left & Strafe RightZ & XLook Down & Look UpFInteractMouseSelect Items, Pass Dialog and interact with menus1,2,3...Select items

Aditional Information:

This game was developed by second year Videogame Bachelor students at Lusófona. Credits:
